title: Grace period?
body: If I am promoted to a new league (silver 1 to gold 5) and I haven't played any games, do I get a few games of grace period before I drop? If so how games in tier promotions?

replies.body:
if you go from say silver 2 to silver 1, you get like 3 games that you won't get demoted for.
in gold 5, plat 5, diamond 5 etc, to drop you need to have the mmr of the lower tiers division 5. so for gold 5, you need silver 5 mmr to drop.

^^ What Alfa said.

Also anyone know if are they putting in the thing where you don't decline from gold V or below this season till the end of the season like they did last year?
There is no LP decay for Gold and below anyway.

You do get a few games before you drop, and the leniency is pretty forgiving. 

I dont know an exact number but when i dropped from P5 to G1 i lost something in the realm of 10 games on 0lp.
